official-title.#text: To provide for the conveyance of a portion of the former Air Force Norwalk Defense Fuel Supply Point in Norwalk, California.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
sponsor.#text: Ms. Linda T. Sánchez of California

header.#text: Land conveyance, former Air Force Norwalk Defense Fuel Supply Point, Norwalk, California

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may convey, without consideration, to the City of Norwalk, California (in this section referred to as the

quote.#tail: ), all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to a parcel of real property, including any improvements thereon, consisting of up to 15 acres at the former Air Force Norwalk Defense Fuel Supply Point for the purpose of permitting the City to use the property for public purposes.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: is contingent upon, or may be executed concurrent with, the City actively assisting the United States in disposing of the residual portion of the former Norwalk Defense Fuel Supply Point (approximately 36 acres) using
disposal authority.
